name: Death-Wish
description:
Made in a week for Brackeys Game Jam 2023.1

A fun short "rougelite" game made about making money and killing bosses! 

The object of the game is to kill the final boss, but in the beginning that's pretty difficult so instead you must traverse the beautiful procedurally generated level killing enemies as you go. For each enemy you kill you gain cash which can be used to open chests giving you wonderful stacking abilities. So at last once you have gained enough strength with all these abilities you can approach the boss once more!
Sadly there is no WebGL version since I could not get it working in time to submit to the jam.
Hope you enjoy the game!
